LandingPage.title: Local Digital Eye
LandingPage.heroTitle: Stop Juggling Digital Tasks. Hire an <accent>AI-Powered Digital Director</accent>.
LandingPage.heroSubtitle: Our service isn't about 'managing your social media'. We act as your Digital Sales Director. Our sole objective is to generate a constant and predictable flow of high-quality client requests through Google, so your only worry is doing the work.
LandingPage.ctaSubtitle: Stop losing customers and start winning with a professional digital strategy. Let's talk.
LandingPage.copyright: © {year} Local Digital Eye. All rights reserved.

services.title: A System Designed for Your Growth

reviewFunnel.title: Intelligent Review Funnel
reviewFunnel.description: We implement a smart system to capture customer feedback, encouraging 5-star reviews on Google and allowing you to privately manage negative feedback.

aiResponder.title: AI-Powered Review Responder
aiResponder.description: Save time and maintain a professional image by generating intelligent, personalized responses to Google reviews in seconds.

seoReports.title: Local SEO Monitoring
seoReports.description: We provide you with clear metrics on your local search visibility and performance, helping you make data-driven decisions.

detailedServices.title: Our Individual Services
detailedServices.subtitle: Each service is designed to solve a specific problem and strengthen your local online presence.

setupFeatures.f2: Configuration of key data (hours, address, phone, website).
setupFeatures.f3: Optimization of categories and business description.
setupFeatures.f4: Upload of logo, cover photo, and up to 10 initial photos.

monthlyFeatures.f2: Upload of new photos/videos provided by the client.
monthlyFeatures.f3: Professional responses to new customer reviews.
monthlyFeatures.f4: Active monitoring of platform changes and competitor activity.
monthlyFeatures.f5: Monthly performance report with key metrics.

setupFeatures.f1: Creation of the filtering system and landing page.
setupFeatures.f2: Design of custom QR code and graphic materials.
setupFeatures.f3: Setup of instant feedback notification alerts.

monthlyFeatures.f1: Proactive strategy to request reviews from customers.
monthlyFeatures.f2: Satisfied customers (5 stars) are directed to Google; others to a private form.
monthlyFeatures.f3: Platform maintenance to ensure proper functioning.

setupFeatures.f1: Design and development of a modern, mobile-friendly single-page site.
setupFeatures.f2: SEO-optimized content writing for local keywords.
setupFeatures.f4: Full integration with your Google Business Profile.

monthlyFeatures.f1: High-speed web hosting and domain management included.
monthlyFeatures.f2: Technical maintenance, security updates, and backups.
monthlyFeatures.f3: Continuous content optimization based on performance.

plans.title: Our Local Presence Plans
plans.subtitle: Choose the plan that best suits your needs. Combine services and save.

promotions.title: Special Offers
promotions.subtitle: Take advantage of our special offers to boost your hiring and maximize savings.

launch.title: Launch Offer
launch.description: Pay for 6 months and we'll waive the setup fee!

details.d1: Professional Plan (6 months): Pay only the monthly fees (6 x €159 = €954) and save €279 on the setup fee.
details.d2: Premium Plan (6 months): Pay only the monthly fees (6 x €225 = €1350) and save €469 on the setup fee.

annual.title: Annual Offer (Maximum Savings)
annual.description: Sign up for 12 months and get FREE setup + 1 FREE month!

details.d1: Premium Plan (Annual): Pay for 11 months (11 x €225 = €2475) and we waive the setup fee (save €469) and give you one month free (save €225). Total savings of €694!

generalConditions.title: General Service Conditions
generalConditions.c1: Recommended minimum contract: 3 months to see solid results.
generalConditions.c2: Billing: Monthly in advance (except for single payment offers).
generalConditions.c3: Requirements: The client must provide 'Administrator' access to their Google Business Profile.

businessDiscovery.title: Business Discovery
businessDiscovery.description: Easily find and add businesses for in-depth analysis using URLs or business details.

insightfulDashboards.title: Insightful Dashboards
insightfulDashboards.description: Visualize analysis with scores, sentiments, and competitor data in a clear, actionable dashboard.

aiRecommendations.title: AI-Powered Recommendations
aiRecommendations.description: Receive AI-driven suggestions for digital services tailored to business needs and market gaps.

competitiveAnalysis.title: Competitive Analysis
competitiveAnalysis.description: Automatically identify and compare against direct competitors to understand market positioning.

geographicTargeting.title: Geographic Targeting
geographicTargeting.description: Utilize interactive maps to search businesses by category within specific geographic zones.

actionableReports.title: Actionable Reports
actionableReports.description: Generate comprehensive reports including diagnostics, recommendations, and competitive insights.

AuthLayout.title: Local Digital Eye
AuthLayout.footer: © {year} Local Digital Eye. Your partner in digital growth.

AuthPage.loginSubtitle: Sign in to access your Local Digital Eye dashboard.
AuthPage.signupSubtitle: Get started with your AI-powered local business analysis.

passwordReset.title: Reset Your Password
passwordReset.description: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
passwordReset.successDescription: Check your email for the password reset link. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.

BusinessesPage.title: Analyzed Businesses
BusinessesPage.description: Manage and review your analyzed businesses.

ProspectingPage.title: Add New Prospects
ProspectingPage.subtitle: Search for businesses on Google to add to your prospecting list.
ProspectingPage.findDescription: Enter a search query like 'Plumbers in London' or 'Garages in Manchester'.
ProspectingPage.prospectsFoundDescription: These are the results from your searches. Filter and connect them to add to the pipeline.
ProspectingPage.notFound: No businesses found for that query. Check for typos or try a more specific search.
ProspectingPage.searchError: An error occurred while searching. Please try again.
ProspectingPage.connectSuccessDescription: The business has been added to your pipeline.
ProspectingPage.connectErrorDescription: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
ProspectingPage.newProspectsToast: new prospects added to the list.
ProspectingPage.noNewProspectsToast: No new prospects found. They might already be in your list.
ProspectingPage.noFilterResults: No results match your current filters.
ProspectingPage.noFilterResultsHint: Try adjusting the filters or performing a new search.
